column3: Added serval things: - table row will be updated (redrawn) after a transaction has been abandoned (new color / change icon) - "Abandon transaction" action is only available if tx is not in mempool and has no confirmation (otherwise it's disabled) - Simple reordering of the context menu (keep mutable action together)
utACK on 42e945d only for backport to 0.12\n
@jonasschnelli can you please rebase so the `rpcwallet.cpp` file is not touched here?\n

Nit: Document the author?

Edit: Also you may want to consider adding the source svg and running optimize png, if not already done.
Nit: This is already merged? Needs rebase?\n
Also it looks like you forgot to add the documentation [here](https://github.com/jonasschnelli/bitcoin/blob/df80f3d097984fa3b5b31be9ed86d2b489dcb5ec/src/wallet/rpcwallet.cpp#L1441)?\n

It's already optimized and the source SVG is not required because it's part of Hutchings typicons (we only added sourced for manipulated or self-created icons).\nAlso `src/qt/res/icons/transaction*.png` covers the copyright info in `contrib/debian/copyright`.\n
Thanks for clarifying, I haven't seen this is unmodified.\n
